external_games.name: Ambient Channels: American Retro - Cozy Café After Hours

name: Ambient Channels: American Retro - Cozy Café After Hours
summary: Visit this Retro series' Café after hours for a nice quiet ambiance. You can explore around the café to find the secret items, or look out the windows and relax as snow falls outside. There's a nice default playlist, or hit F6 and select another playlist of your choice.
